body:
Comment 1: 
I can't reproduce you problem with this program:

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"log"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	err := os.MkdirAll("c:/foo", 0755)
	if err != nil {
		log.Fatal(err)
	}
	fmt.Printf("All good\n")
}

C:\>dir c:\foo
 Volume in drive C is Local Disk
 Volume Serial Number is C458-E628

 Directory of c:\

File Not Found

C:\>test.exe
All good

C:\>dir c:\foo
 Volume in drive C is Local Disk
 Volume Serial Number is C458-E628

 Directory of c:\foo

08/09/2011  03:21p      <DIR>          .
08/09/2011  03:21p      <DIR>          ..
               0 File(s)              0 bytes
               2 Dir(s)   5,698,568,192 bytes free

C:\>


I use Windows 2000 and hg id: d084dfee7dd3+ tip

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
